title: Light and Motion Stella Bike Light
author: Hofweber

comments.content: Beautiful typeface! I'd like to know this one as well.
Cheers Tiffany, buying this after my new paycheck for some bike decals!

Kinescope may be similar, but it’s not an exact match.  
This could well be custom.

Darnit. I'm off my game. That is [Fabulous](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023214727/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfontspecimens), part of the Las Vegas package, from House Industries. Horizontally squooshed and they closed the a.
